item.title: On liking a lot of different things
item.description: This post will talk about my thoughts on having multiple interests and having the time to satisfy them.

item.title: On studying and the role of educational institutions
item.description: This post will talk about my thoughts concerning knowledge, the act of studying, and the role of educational institutions in this topic.
